mailto: > wrote: 
Mike, 
I think it would be useful to get a better understanding of your position—it would be helpful for us to 
know, for example, how much time you propose to take to evaluate matters, and whether we can provide 
any additional information that might be useful for that process of evaluation. That likely will affect ur 
determination regarding the grand jury appearance, at which we would expect, were we to cal 
to ask her a number of questions we would expect to argue to the court do not implicate a fifth amen ment 
privilege—i.e., that she couldn't simply blanket invoke. Would it be useful to discuss via phone? 
thanks, 
From: Michael Bachner 
Sent: Wednesda Jul 
To: 
Cc: 
10 2019 10:25 
Subject: Re: Epstein investigation 
Dear Counsel: 
EFTA00014569

I met wit nd I need time to evaluate matters. Regardin the sub na to testify before the 
Grand Jury on we hereby notify you that if called as a witness would invoke her Fifth 
Amendment privilege against compelled self-incrimination. Please let me now if you will require her to 
invoke in person or whether this communication suffices and no appertaining will be required. 
Yours truly, 
Michael Bachner 
Michael Bachner 
Bachner & Associates, PC 
39 Broadway-Suite 1610 
New York, NY 10006

Mr. Bachner, 
Following up on our conversation earlier this morning, we wanted to provide you with the additional 
information and materials we discussed. In the first instance, so that you have full contact info for the 
team, please feel free to reach out to any of us at any time; we're all available via email or at the following 
hone numbers: 
Additionally, attached are the non-prosecution agreement, previously publicly filed in civil proceedings in 
Florida, and a blank version of our standard proffer agreement, both as discussed. 
As we mentioned, please don't hesitate to reach out with any questions, and we look forward to setting a 
time to speak again after you're able to confer with 
thank you, 
EFTA00014570

Assistant U.S. 
Attorney 
Southern District of New York

<Epstein NPA, dated 2007-09-24.pdf>
